Reviews.Title: Love it so much
Reviews.Author: Kevin232
Reviews.Content: it really is a good phone and works quite well. The screen looks so nice and earphone sounds clearly. Touch is good and easy to operate. Totally It is an awesome smart phone with high performance-to-price ratio.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: daniela
Reviews.Content: it great! i love this phone i can finally text in korean and french since you are able to change the language to another besides english and spanish! the only thing i wish was that i could find a case for it since they don't have this phone model in Washington State (which is where i live)

Reviews.Title: it's a good buy
Reviews.Author: carlton
Reviews.Content: got this phone after a long wait but its a big good looking phone,the touch is good too,but the thing is it takes forever to charge,the charger and earphone ports is unusually long so that its hard to buy a better charger and earphone also there is no accessories for this phone,anyway its a good phone and works quite well,not bad

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: sherri carr
Reviews.Content: I really like this phone! it works great, loud and clear sound speakers,cheap price for a good phone, fast deliv

Reviews.Title: not worth it
Reviews.Author: Corianna
Reviews.Content: this phone will eventually stop working do not buy it.. its a dumb phone its from china and it takes forever to load and do anything and you cant even download apps ...

Reviews.Title: Junk! NO GOOD!....
Reviews.Author: Andrea R.
Reviews.Content: Well I ordered this phone awhile ago.... it took forever to get here, which was to be expected cause it came from China. Then I finally get it, and the size was good,color was good BUT!... sound quality was really awful!.... and not to mention it kept dropping calls!... I would not recommend anyone get this, but it's up to you if you do... and besides whose to say, maybe it was just the one I received. Well, after being disappointed with this item, I immediately sent this item back to seller. Now it's been one week or so,since this seller had this item back in their possession... and I was told I would get my money back.... and STILL HAVE NOT GOT IT!!.... they also said it had to be tested, before I could get my money back.... and still.... nothing. I returned this item right after receiving it, and now I feel as if I was played, on my refund. To top it off, whenever I contacted this particular seller, he responded back rather quickly.... But, now since I am requesting my money back from a defective item that was sent to me.... suddenly, he does NOT have the time to respond back to me, when I asked about the status of my refund. THIS SELLER IS A CROOK!.... EVERYTHING IS ALL GOOD UNTIL A PERSON NEED THEIR MONEY BACK!... DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER!!... BUT KNOW IF YOU DO, IT WILL BE AT YOUR OWN RISK!... YOU BEEN WARNED.

Reviews.Title: takes forever to get it
Reviews.Author: mara
Reviews.Content: i pay for this phone almost a week ago and they did not send until today or yesterday, not happy with that.

Takes pictures or enjoy video talk with the built-in powerful cameras
ProductInfo.Name: GT-A7100 4.0" Android 4.04 SC6810 1.0GHz Smartphone with Wi-Fi, JAVA, Camera, Capacitive Touch (Pink)
